bangumir 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Get user's collection

Source: R/bgm-user-collection.R
bgm_user_collection.Rd

Get user's collection

bgm_user_collection(
  username,
  cat = c("watching", "all_watching"),
  ids = NULL,
  responseGroup = c("medium", "small"),
  format = c("list", "table", "default")
)

Arguments

username

User name a user id.
cat

Collection category, watching for anime and real, all_watching for anime, real and book.
ids

Numeric vector of subject id.
responseGroup

Response of details type is set to be medium, setting small for simplified mode.
format

Result will be a list of json data when set to list (default), response() object when set to default, and a data.table when set to table.

Examples

bgm_user_collection(username = "sai", format = "table")
